overview:
Julie Macklowe is moving from the Hedge Fund industry to fashion. She is launching a fashion related company and is planning to make seed investments in other fashion businesses.

Julie set up Macklowe Asset Management in late 2008, where she managed $250M on behalf of Millennium Partners. She is a consumer and retail stock specialist. Previous to that she was a portfolio manager for Sigma Capital Management, but was laid off during the down turn in late 2008, which led her to set up her own Asset Management company.
